FuncDef: The display e1-drive-mode state command displays the drive output mode of an E1 subcard.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
When you test the drive output mode of an E1 subcard, if the output waveform and meter template do not match, run the display e1-drive-mode state command and check the current drive output mode. Based on the command output, you can run the set e1-drive-mode to change the waveform.
